Description: Body sherd of Attic pottery little master cup; interior glazed black; exterior: reserved handle zone, lip glazed as far as preserved; dilute brown line above black lower wall; inscription in handle zone.
Curator's comments: The sherd belongs to the same vessel as British Museum 1948,0815.9. The sherd lacks two Gordion cup features (black line at bottom of handle zone and reserved line at junction of lip on inside) (Robertson 1951, 146-8, no. 7).
